regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui u = client.request('http://www.nzbmovieseeker.com/Genre/Action/') e = re.findall('(?s)id="NewPosts">.+?f="[^"]*.+?>([^\(]*)\(([^\)]*).+?bar" id="([^"]*).+?img src="([^"]*)', u) e = [(i[0],i[1],'tt'+i[2],i[3]) for i in e] return e
